title: Karnage
description: Selena Somerset enrolls into Vanderwald Academy to develop her Ceres, the special ability to generate and control electricity. She soon discovers that she may not be the average Valkryn in Celestria that she thought she was when she discovers a power hidden inside her that is deeply rooted into a tangled past she never once knew. As the descendant of an ancient power, Selena is thrown into a destiny she never wanted.A thief's sudden rampage, committing the most heinous crime based on the Valkryn Law, terrorizes Celestria--Selena and Lucas are thrown into a fire that cannot be extinguished as they must figure out who the culprit is and bring him to justice. Friendship, love, and betrayal lay in wake for Selena as she is faced with the impossible decision to save the many or to save the one she loves, especially when she discovers that the culprit may be the only person who can unlock the lost past that she's afraid to discover.KARNAGE is the beginning of Selena's thrilling adventure and the first book of THE PHOENIX ASHES TRILOGY.
author: A.J. Leigh
